comments.comments_text: Goal! Joshua Kimmich (Bayern Munich) shows perfect technique and produces a first-time effort from just outside the box that goes inside the left post. It's 0:1.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Martins Felipe (Hannover) was quite harsh and Soren Storks didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Joshua Kimmich (Bayern Munich) goes over to take the corner kick and it looks like he will swing the ball into the penalty box.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) goes over to take the corner kick and it looks like he will swing the ball into the penalty box.

comments.comments_text: David Alaba (Bayern Munich) gets to the ball on the edge of the box and fires in a first-time shot without any hesitation. The strike is excellent and goes straight into the top right corner. He couldn't have done it any better. 0:2.

comments.comments_text: There will be a change on the pitch for the second half. Andre Breitenreiter probably wasn't satisfied with the performance of Martins Felipe. He is replaced by Linton Maina (Hannover).
